mema thaththwayata muhuna dima sandaha jathika jala sampadana ha jalapawahana mandalaya wisin jala bawusara mangin sidu karanu labana jala sampadana katayuthu pulul kirimatath, nala lin 400k idi kirimatath, niyangayata lak wiya haki gramiya pradeshawala danata thibena athin pompa kala haki podu gambauru lin 1,000k aluthwadiya kara punaruththapanaya kirimatath, athin pompa kala haki lin 200k dushkara gammanawala idi kirimatath, jalaya arapirimasmen prayojanayata ganima pilibandawa mahajanathawa danumwath kirimatath, jala sapayum hadisiye adala wana awasthawanhidi awashya kadinam piyawara ganima sandaha adala baladharin ha aayathana samanga sambandhikarana katayuthu sidu kirimatath nagara salasum ha jala sampadana amathya rawuf hakim mahatha idiripath kala yojana amathya mandalaya wisin anumatha karana ladi.

jagath tenis pitiye anka eke kridika denmarkaye karolin wosniyaki lakunu 6 - 3 k saha 7 - 6 k lesa kanadawe aleksandra wosniyak parajaya karamin pransha wiwrutha tenis tharagawaliye thunwani watayata piwisimata samath wuwaya.me dakwa grand slam tenis kirulak jaya gatha nohakiwu 20 hawiridi wosniyaki pasugiya pransha tenis tharagawaliye ardha awasan purwa watayen iwathata wisiwuwaya.namuth mewara tharagawaliye di grand slam surathawath jaya ganime sihinaya saba kara ganimata uparima ayurin krida karana bawa aya jayagrahanayen anathurawa pawasuwaya.me athara rusiyawe swetlana kusanetsowa, wira wonariwa, pranshaye meriyan batoli, ostreliyawe samantha ditrosar, sarbiyawe jelina janakowik da thunwani watayata piwisimata samath wuha..
